hard: Satori – Satori applies Fox marks (read damage) each time the enemy gains bonus energy. Jorgen’s shield provides allies with extra energy and each time Jorgen does a basic attack he steals energy from the enemy.

Martha – Jorgen’s “Leper” skills allow Jorgen and his teammates to attack the furthest enemy for a small period of time. Martha is strong enough to survive all incoming damage and this means she will allow her frontline to regenerate health while she is receiving damage.
soft: Heroes who don’t need the energy to be effective. For example, Keira doesn’t need energy too much to be effective.
